statements: SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT device_name, brand, price FROM inventory;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE stock_level > 50;
SELECT device_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE brand = 'Apple';
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, brand, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE brand = 'Samsung' ORDER BY stock_level ASC;
SELECT id, device_name, price FROM inventory WHERE stock_level < 10 AND brand = 'Apple' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, device_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY device_name ASC, stock_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE brand IN ('Samsung', 'Apple') ORDER BY price ASC, device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE stock_level > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT store_name, location FROM store WHERE manager_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory
SELECT * FROM store
SELECT product_name, stock_level, price FROM inventory ORDER BY stock_level DESC
SELECT store_name, location, opening_hours FROM store WHERE location='New York'
SELECT store_name, manager_name FROM store ORDER BY store_name ASC
SELECT * FROM RetailStoresInventory;
SELECT store_name, location FROM RetailStoresInventory ORDER BY store_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, category, price FROM WearableDevices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location FROM RetailStoresInventory WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY store_id;
SELECT * FROM StockTransactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RetailStoresInventory ORDER BY store_name ASC, location DESC;
SELECT device_name, category, price FROM WearableDevices WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT store_id, store_name, SUM(quantity_changed) AS total_quantity_changed FROM RetailStoresInventory JOIN StockTransactions ON RetailStoresInventory.store_id = StockTransactions.store_id GROUP BY store_id, store_name;
SELECT device_name, price FROM WearableDevices WHERE category = 'Fitness' AND price < 100 ORDER BY device_name;
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM WearableDevices WHERE category = 'Smartwatch';
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM inventory;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location, manager_name FROM stores;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, quantity_sold, price_per_unit FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT store_name, location, manager_name FROM stores WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY store_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, category, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price < 500 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT store_name, location, manager_name FROM stores WHERE manager_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY location, store_name ASC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, quantity_sold, price_per_unit FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM WearableDevices;
SELECT device_name, category, price FROM WearableDevices ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT device_name, brand, stock_quantity FROM WearableDevices WHERE category='Smartwatch';
SELECT device_name, brand, price FROM WearableDevices WHERE price BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT device_name, category, price FROM WearableDevices WHERE brand='Apple' ORDER BY price;
SELECT device_name, brand, category FROM WearableDevices;
SELECT device_name, brand, price FROM WearableDevices WHERE price > 500;
SELECT device_name, stock_quantity FROM WearableDevices ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT store_name, location, manager_name FROM Stores WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT s.store_name, SUM(sales.quantity_sold) AS total_sold FROM Sales AS sales JOIN Stores AS s ON sales.store_id = s.store_id GROUP BY s.store_name ORDER BY total_sold DESC;
